ComicInfo.Summary:
In the sadistic land of Nidal, the god of torture reigns, and terror is a way of life. When the martial artist Sajan tracks his lost sister to the manor of a twisted noble, he has no choice but to break in—and who better to help him than the convicted burglar Merisiel? Together, the two enter the house of horrors, only to discover that getting in is easy—it’s getting out again that’s the problem.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A/Reg | Regular Cover | Stjepan Sejic | 1 | B/Var | Variant Cover | Leandro Oliveira & Mohan | 2 | C/Sub | Subscription Cover | Sean Izaakse & Mohan | 3 | D/LE | Ultra-Limited Edition Variant Cover | Jorge Faras | 4 | E/RE | Paizo.com Exclusive Cover | Sebastian Cichon | 5 |
